name: MUGAD
body:
### Welcome to MUGAD.
Microsoft User Group Abu Dhabi. Our mission is to engage every individual or organization interested to build applications on Microsoft Platform specifically for IOT (Internet of Things). 

### Our Website
http://www.mugad.ae

### Support or Contact
Email: saad[at]saadasharif[dot]com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
